channel.title: 17th Workshop on Virtualization in High-Performance Cloud Computing
channel.description: Recent content on 17th Workshop on Virtualization in High-Performance Cloud Computing

item.description: The Workshop on Virtualization in HighÂ­-Performance Cloud Computing (VHPC) aims to bring together researchers and industrial practitioners facing the challenges posed by virtualization in HPC/Cloud scenarios in order to foster discussion, collaboration, mutual exchange of knowledge and experience, enabling research to ultimately provide novel solutions for virtualized computing systems of tomorrow. VHPC’22 Tentative Program (schedule to be defined soon) Keynote Talks “rtla: finding the sources of OS noise on Linux", Daniel Bristot De Oliveira, Senior Principal Software Engineer in the real-time kernel team at Red Hat.
